price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Enti mofri Nyankopͻn akyi som adeε a entumi mfa ͻhaw anaasε mfasoͻ biara mma mo?” Nyankopͻn deε Ɔne Otiefoͻ no a Ɔte biribiara, na Ɔno ara nso ne Onimdefoͻ no a Onim biribiara no.
arabic: قُلۡ أَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا نَفۡعٗاۚ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul ataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lakum ḍarran walā nafʿan wal-lahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
